name: 阿佳塔·莫雷拉
name_full: 阿佳塔·莫雷拉 Agatha Moreira
birth_place: 巴西, 里约热内卢州, 里约热内卢市

last_movies.title: 秘密与谎言 第二季
秘密与谎言 第一季

introduction: Agatha Cerqueira Pereira Moreira (born 19 January 1992) is a Brazilian actress and model. She became known to participate in the twentieth season of teen novel Malhação in 2012, but rather was a model for several countries where she held numerous advertising campaigns, she graced magazine articles and was the girl advertising various known brands. Starred in Em Família and other projects, to be recognized for her performance in Verdades Secretas.From Rio and humble family, born and raised in suburban neighborhood Olaria, Agatha always wanted to be a model and actress, and even with financial difficulties, the family joined to make a book girl, and so had the agency, was soon selected because of its beauty. By doing show test with other competitors, it was approved, and then began working as a model at 14 years old in 2006. Soon after, with the model of money invested in training courses and became an actress, participating in small pieces theater, and eventually managed to get on TV in 2012.She debuted as an actress in 2012 and excelled playing Ju, the protagonist of 20th season of Malhação of Rede Globo. And in 2014, the same station, was part of the cast of Em Família, as the spoiled Giselle.In 2015 she had the role of greater repercussion of her career in Verdades Secretas, as Giovanna, a rich and reckless young woman who prostitutes herself. Participated in the 9th edition of the framework Dança dos Famosos in Domingão do Faustão.
